me.donkeycore.dpl.io

Class FileCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.donkeycore.dpl.io.FileCreator

  • public class FileCreator
extends java.lang.Object
    Allows you to create files, batch files, bash files, and Donkey files and manage them easily.
    Since:
    1.0
    See Also:
    getFile(File), getFile(String, String), getBatchFile(String), getBashScript(String), getDonkeyClass(String), createFile(String), createNewFolder(String), getFile(File), FileCreator.FileConfiguration, FileCreator.FileConfiguration.FileRunConfiguration, FileCreator.FileBatchConfiguration, FileCreator.FileBashConfiguration, FileCreator.FileDonkeyConfiguration

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  FileCreator.FileBashConfiguration
      A more specific version of FileCreator.FileConfiguration that is based on Bash files.
      static class  FileCreator.FileBatchConfiguration
      A more specific version of FileCreator.FileConfiguration that is based on Batch files.
      static class  FileCreator.FileConfiguration
      Configures files and easily allows adding/clearing/running code before the code runs.
      static class  FileCreator.FileDonkeyConfiguration
      A more specific version of FileCreator.FileConfiguration that is based on Donkey class files.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.io.File rootFolderFile
      The root folder of all subfolders and files

      • loadFilesAndFolders

        public static final void loadFilesAndFolders()

        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:

      • createFile

        public static java.io.File createFile(java.lang.String name)
        Create a file based on its name. This method is automatically called by all the methods to retrieve files when creating a file.

        Donkey scripts will be placed in the /scripts/ folder
        Batch scripts will be placed in the /batch/ folder
        Bash scripts will be placed in the /bash/ folder
        Any other files will be placed in the root folder
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the file, with the extension
        Returns:
        A file created and organized correctly
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        FileCreator

      • createNewFolder

        public static boolean createNewFolder(java.lang.String path)
        Creates a folder based on its path.
        Parameters:
        path - The path of the folder, including the folder's name and extension. The path starts in the root folder.
        Returns:
        Whether a folder was created or not
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        FileCreator

      • createNewFolder

        public static boolean createNewFolder(java.io.File f)
        Creates a folder based on its file.
        Parameters:
        f - The file representing the folder to create.
        Returns:
        Whether a folder was created or not
        Since:
        1.0
        See Also:
        FileCreator
